name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Field Engineer with 8 years of experience, specializing in fault finding, repairs, and customer service to deliver exceptional solutions in the field. Proficient in leveraging **Salesforce** for customer relationship management and project tracking, alongside a solid foundation in problem-solving and technical troubleshooting. My background in electrical, electronic, and mechanical systems enhances my capability to effectively diagnose issues and implement corrective actions, ensuring optimal equipment performance. I bring strong interpersonal skills and a commitment to providing excellent service to clients, consistently fostering positive relationships. Additionally, my proven ability to work independently and drive results allows me to contribute successfully to team objectives.
